_metadata.description: Restore the delegated AI test suite generation pipeline.

requirements.title: AI suite generation + delegation restored
requirements.description: Rebuild CLI/API endpoints that analyze codebases, call App Issue Tracker, and emit deterministic local suites when delegation is unavailable.

validation.notes: CLI acceptance tests exercise the suite generation workflow
API integration tests verify suite persistence plus deterministic fallback defaults
Covers suite request payload validation + persistence and query helpers
